Question
========

The cross table below shows how two Utrecht constituencies voted voted during the last referendum on the European Constitution: for, against or blank.

  ---------------- ------ ------- -------- For Against Blank Electoral district 1 183 161 12 Electoral district 2 212 228 16 Total 395 398 28 ---------------- ------ ------- --------

If we randomly choose one from these 812 voters, chances are that it is someone from district 1, and that they voted against the Constitution, is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2
* 0.21
* 0.45
* 0.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2: Correct
* 0.21: Incorrect
* 0.45: Incorrect
* 0.7: Incorrect
